CBD industry needs an ‘Emerald Exchange’ type event where Hemp Farmers can connect directly with MJ and Hemp Product Manufacturers. The brokers in this market along with fake buyers are the reason no one trusts anyone and prices continue to fall, hurting the limited number of farmers who are trying to cultivate quality honest product. Need to cut out the middle man and help everyone get a fair price to truly calm down this market. Let’s build long term business relationships and treat people with respect.
Looking to connect with Hemp Farms and CBD product manufacturers around the country to facilitate this movement.
It was a pleasure speaking last night in L.A. on Banking and payments in the State legal Cannabis industry. Thank you CLAB for hosting a great event!

You can spend countless hours researching and attending expos, or you can hire an expert with 11+ years of successfully managing every sector in the cannabis industry, and finally get the answers you are looking for. Time is $$, spend it wisely.

National Association of Cannabis Businesses (NACB)Established in 2017, the National Association of Cannabis Businesses (NACB) is the cannabis industry’s first self-regulatory organization (SRO). The NACB will strengthen leading cannabis-related businesses by reducing regulatory uncertainty and increasing legitimacy. A licensed cannabis grower, dispensary, processor or ancillary business may apply to become a member. Membership in the NACB will give businesses the ability to shape the future of their industry, and deliver access to tools and services that will help optimize their success. The NACB is led by a group of government, legal, financial, and data and analytics experts who have dedicated their careers to helping business owners in other industries successfully navigate complex regulatory challenges.
Social Chair of Los Angeles Chapter

The Cannabis LAB, brought to you by www.legallearningseries.com, is made for and of professional business people currently in or committed to the cannabis industry. LAB stands for Law, Accounting, and Business. There are many places you can go to learn about starting a dispensary, refining extracts, setting up a grow, or getting a license. This is NOT that group. This group is for professionals seeking a higher level of education focused on improving their organizations and implementing best legal, accounting, and business practices. Our goal is to bring the brightest business minds together to share their experiences and methodologies so that we may thrive in the face of regulation. http://www.legallearningseries.com/clab

On Cannabis Business Minds, Kristen Yoder and Simone Cimiluca-Radzins interview today's most successful Cannabis entrepreneurs and professionals. If you’re looking for quick, easy, and value added information about doing business in the cannabis industry, then look no more. Each episode of Cannabis Business Minds will provide you valuable tips and insight from industry leaders that you can apply to your own business or career. For more insight on cannabis business emerging trends, join our Facebook community at https://www.facebook.com/groups/cbmpodcast/

There are few things I find more enjoyable than getting the opportunity to recommend a person as professional and of such high character as Ms. Kristen Yoder.It would not be inaccurate to say that if I had not connected with Kristen I would not be standing at the precipice of achieving so many personal and professional goals. Kristen was one of the first people in the cannabis industry with whom I connected on LinkedIn and the first to say "call me" when I started contemplating a move into this exciting emerging industry.While I have not been fortunate enough to have had the opportunity to work with Kristen "formally", she has continually acted as a professional sounding board for my ideas.Throughout the process of launching my start up Kristen has been supportive, enthusiastic and willing to offer her honest feedback. I feel very fortunate that I have been able to network with Kristen. She truly represents the best of the what we are trying to build the cannabis industry to be.

I've had the pleasure of working with Kristen for almost 5 years now, and I can firmly state she's an exceptional individual with many talents. Her attention to detail supported by a broad based view of the world (both front-facing consumer side and back-end operations side) is further solidified by her strong intellectual abilities. She tackles new projects with incredible speed and accuracy. Her abilities to develop new products, new procedures and make a positive impact on a company's operations would most certainly be welcomed by any company. She has a wonderful demeanor, can-do attitude and a willingness to constantly work hard. You can tell she is passionate about what she does! Definitely excellent qualities in my opinion, and the kind that are hard to see from any resume. I strongly recommend anyone looking to bolster their team's abilities to speak with Kristen and see how she can accelerate your company's efforts!

Thanks to Pauli's CBD tinctures, my mom, and several of her friends have found long sought after relief for acute pain, anxiety, and insomnia. There has yet to be an instance where someone tried his tincture and didn't find relief. Here are a couple testimonials(with more to come) from my mom and one of her friends:Andi M. , Las Vegas, NVI have Muscular Dystrophy (CPEO+ Ragged Fiber Disease). My symptoms mimic having the flu - my muscles suffer from severe inflamation. Because of this, sleeping through the night is difficult, and restorative rest is elusive. I have found that the CBD tincture reduces the inflammation, brings about relaxation, so much so...  that I fall soundly asleep without waking up during the night. Dottee M. , Las Vegas, NVI had knee surgery and the pain was so extreme that I became sleep deprived. Taking the CBD tincture allowed me to fall asleep and stay asleep without feeling any knee pain throughout  the entire night, enabling me to start my day with the ability to perform my knee therapy.  I am happily working towards my full recovery! I truly cant speak highly enough about Pauli and the work he is doing!

summary: “A smart person makes a mistake, learns from it, and never makes that mistake again. But a wise person finds a smart person and learns from them how to avoid the mistake altogether”  Roy H. Williams Over the past 12 years, I have managed and/or set up the first dispensary in the City of LA (California Alternative Caregivers), 2 edible companies, one being an I502 compliant edible company in WA (Evergreen Herbal), the other being one of the largest edible companies in CA (Venice Cookie Company), as well a cannabis testing lab (The Werc Shop) with multiple locations on the west coast. In 2015, I moved into the ancillary side and began working with a renewable energy generator company(YOU-GEN) with a focus on bringing sustainable energy to cannabis cultivators. In 2016, I became partner at a management consulting company(LIV Advisors), and was also a co-host on the popular podcast, Cannabis Business Minds.I am the founder and CEO of Cannabis Industry Advisory Group. We specialize in advising entrepreneurs and investors looking to enter the CA cannabis industry. I'm also the current social chair for the Cannabis LAB Los Angeles, a national educational networking organization focused on bringing cannabis business owners together with Lawyers, Accountants and Business consultants, as they are essential to each other in the pursuit of attaining licensing!
name: Kristen Yoder
title: I Advise Businesses and Investors Interested in the CA Cannabis Industry
